name: Petris (Tino3210, petitBiscuits, piskel)
description:
Petris... Piskel · Petris Lore

Everybody loves Petris... From the dawn of the universe, humanity has been nothing but fuelled by rage, lust and jealousy. But we have put an end to it.

Play Petris, to soothe your primitive instincts and forget the insignificance of your existence.

Pieces know as Petrominos will come from the depth bellow the screen.  You must land them on the center piece in the middle of screen. Once a piece lands, the whole screen rotates counter-clockwise. Filling a square around the center block destroys the pieces composing it and gives you a dopamine spike, and points.

Petris, everybody loves Petris.

May you play until the end of time...

This game has been made during the 2022 UPsi Jam in the span of 48h.

Controls ActionKeys
Move petrominoW, A, S, DRotate petrominoQ, EAccelerate petrominoSPACEBAR Resources

Themes based on :
- Tetris - Theme A
- Tetris Attack - Poochy's Theme (Forest Theme)

Voices : Microsoft TTS
